metadata.description: A project roadmap managed by Project Roadmap Tracking
metadata.name: My Project Roadmap

tasks.details: implement the add command to be able to add tasks to the prt.json from the command line
tasks.title: Add command

tasks.details: add a utility to update the prt file in place
tasks.title: Update util

tasks.details: Publish the project-roadmap-tracking package to the NPM registry to make it publicly available for installation
tasks.title: Publish package to NPM

tasks.details: Install project-roadmap-tracking as a local development dependency for testing and development purposes
tasks.title: Install PRT locally

tasks.details: Install project-roadmap-tracking globally via npm to make the prt command available system-wide for all projects
tasks.title: Install PRT globally

tasks.details: Create and configure a PRT skill integration for Claude Code to enable AI-assisted project roadmap management through natural language commands
tasks.title: Add PRT skill to Claude

tasks.details: Update README.md to reflect current project state, commands, and documentation
tasks.title: Update README

tasks.details: Create ARCHITECTURE.md documentation showing the ideal structure of the project including layer architecture, design patterns, data flow, and extension points
tasks.title: Generate ARCHITECTURE.md file

tasks.details:
Create the foundational test directory structure:
- test/fixtures/ - Test data factories and sample data
- test/helpers/ - Test utility functions
- test/unit/util/ - Unit tests for utilities
- test/unit/services/ - Unit tests for services (to be created)

This structure will organize all test files and make them easy to find. Creates the foundation for all subsequent test infrastructure work.
tasks.title: Create test directory structure

tasks.details:
Create test/fixtures/task-factory.ts to generate test Task objects with sensible defaults.

Factory should provide:
- createTask(overrides?) - Generate single task with optional field overrides
- createTasks(count, overrides?) - Generate multiple tasks
- Preset factories: createBugTask(), createFeatureTask(), createPlanningTask()
- Realistic default values for all fields (id, title, details, status, priority, etc.)

This factory will be used by every test file that needs task data. Essential for avoiding test data duplication.
tasks.title: Create task factory for test data

tasks.details:
Create test/fixtures/roadmap-factory.ts to generate test Roadmap objects.

Factory should provide:
- createRoadmap(overrides?) - Generate roadmap with optional overrides
- createEmptyRoadmap() - Roadmap with no tasks
- createSimpleRoadmap() - Roadmap with 3-5 tasks
- createComplexRoadmap() - Roadmap with dependencies, various statuses, etc.

Should integrate with task-factory.ts to generate realistic task data. This enables testing roadmap-level operations without manual JSON construction.
tasks.title: Create roadmap factory for test data

tasks.details:
Create test/fixtures/config-factory.ts to generate test Config objects (.prtrc.json).

Factory should provide:
- createConfig(overrides?) - Generate config with optional overrides
- Default values for roadmapPath, version, etc.
- Ability to generate configs pointing to temp test directories

This enables testing of config reading/writing without polluting real config files.
tasks.title: Create config factory for test data

tasks.details:
Create static JSON fixture files in test/fixtures/json/:
- empty-roadmap.json - Valid roadmap with no tasks
- simple-roadmap.json - 3-5 tasks, no dependencies
- complex-roadmap.json - 10+ tasks with dependencies, various statuses, multiple types
- invalid-roadmap.json - Malformed JSON for error testing
- circular-deps-roadmap.json - Tasks with circular dependencies

These fixtures enable testing of file parsing, validation, and edge cases without generating data programmatically.
tasks.title: Create sample JSON fixtures

tasks.details:
Create test/helpers/fs-helpers.ts with utilities for file system testing:
- createTempDir() - Create temporary test directory
- cleanupTempDir(path) - Clean up after tests
- createTempRoadmapFile(roadmap) - Write roadmap to temp file
- createTempConfigFile(config) - Write config to temp file
- readTempFile(path) - Read temp file contents

Should integrate with Mocha's beforeEach/afterEach hooks. Essential for testing all file I/O operations without affecting real project files.
tasks.title: Create file system test helpers

tasks.details:
Create test/helpers/assertions.ts with PRT-specific test assertions:
- assertValidTaskId(id) - Verify TaskID format
- assertValidTask(task) - Verify complete task structure
- assertTaskEquals(actual, expected) - Deep comparison ignoring timestamps
- assertRoadmapValid(roadmap) - Verify roadmap structure
- assertHasTasks(roadmap, count) - Verify task count

These helpers make test assertions more readable and reduce boilerplate in test files.
tasks.title: Create custom assertion helpers

tasks.details:
Create test/unit/util/validate-task-id.test.ts with comprehensive tests for TaskID format validation.

Test cases:
- Valid formats: B-001, F-042, I-999, P-003, R-001
- Invalid formats: missing dash, wrong prefix, non-numeric, wrong padding
- Edge cases: boundary numbers (000, 001, 999)

File: test/unit/util/validate-task-id.test.ts
Target: src/util/validate-task-id.ts
tasks.title: Unit tests for validate-task-id

Create test/unit/util/validate-task.test.ts Part 1 - basic field validation.

Test cases:

- Valid enum values (status, priority, type)
- Field type validation (strings, arrays, booleans)

tasks.details:
Design TaskService interface and create src/services/task.service.ts.

Interface should include:
- generateNextId(roadmap, taskType) - ID generation algorithm
- createTask(data) - Create new task object
- addTask(roadmap, task) - Add task to roadmap
- findTask(roadmap, taskId) - Find task by ID
- updateTask(roadmap, taskId, updates) - Update existing task

Document all methods with JSDoc. This will be the core service for task operations.

File: src/services/task.service.ts
tasks.title: Design TaskService interface

tasks.details:
Extract ID generation algorithm from src/commands/add.ts:53-66 to TaskService.

Implement generateNextId() method:
- Takes roadmap and task type as inputs
- Finds existing IDs for that type
- Returns next available ID (fills gaps, e.g., if B-001, B-003 exist, returns B-002)
- Handles edge cases: empty roadmap, all IDs taken up to 999

Move logic from add.ts lines 53-66 to src/services/task.service.ts
Ensure add.ts still works by calling the service method.
tasks.title: Extract ID generation from add command

tasks.details:
Create test/unit/services/task.service.test.ts Part 1 - basic ID generation.

Test cases:
- First ID is X-001 (where X is type prefix)
- Sequential IDs: B-001, B-002, B-003
- Different types don't interfere: B-001, F-001, P-001 can coexist
- IDs are zero-padded correctly

File: test/unit/services/task.service.test.ts
Target: src/services/task.service.ts
tasks.title: Unit tests for ID generation Part 1

tasks.details:
Extend test/unit/services/task.service.test.ts Part 2 - edge cases and gap filling.

Test cases:
- Gap filling: if B-001, B-003 exist, next ID is B-002
- Handle deleted tasks (gaps in sequence)
- Maximum ID boundary (999)
- Empty roadmap edge case
- Multiple gaps: B-001, B-005, B-010 -> next is B-002

Extends existing test file: test/unit/services/task.service.test.ts
Target: src/services/task.service.ts
tasks.title: Unit tests for ID generation Part 2

tasks.details:
Implement createTask() and addTask() methods in TaskService.

createTask():
- Takes task data (title, details, type, etc.)
- Generates task ID using generateNextId()
- Sets timestamps (createdAt, updatedAt)
- Sets defaults for optional fields
- Returns complete Task object

addTask():
- Takes roadmap and task object
- Validates task
- Adds to roadmap.tasks array
- Returns updated roadmap

tasks.title: Implement createTask and addTask methods

tasks.details:
Design RoadmapService interface and create src/services/roadmap.service.ts.

Interface should include:
- load(path) - Read roadmap from file
- save(path, roadmap) - Write roadmap to file
- validate(roadmap) - Validate roadmap structure
- getStats(roadmap) - Get roadmap statistics (task counts by status, type, etc.)

This service abstracts all file I/O and roadmap-level operations.

Implement load() and save() methods in RoadmapService.

load():

- Returns validated Roadmap object

save():
- Wraps writeRoadmapFile() utility
- Validates before writing
- Adds error handling

Interface should include:

- search(tasks, query) - Search in title/details
- getByStatus(tasks, status) - Get tasks by status
- getByType(tasks, type) - Get tasks by type

filter():

Extract filtering logic from src/commands/list.ts (if any exists).

tasks.details:
Design TaskDependencyService interface and create src/services/task-dependency.service.ts.

Interface should include:
- buildGraph(tasks) - Build dependency graph
- detectCircular(tasks) - Detect circular dependencies
- validateDependencies(roadmap) - Full dependency validation
- getBlockedTasks(task) - Get tasks blocked by this task
- getDependsOnTasks(task) - Get tasks this task depends on
- topologicalSort(tasks) - Sort tasks by dependency order (Phase 10)

File: src/services/task-dependency.service.ts
tasks.title: Design TaskDependencyService interface

tasks.details:
Implement buildGraph() method for dependency graph construction.

buildGraph():
- Create adjacency list representation
- Map each task ID to its dependencies
- Include both depends-on and blocks relationships
- Return graph structure for analysis

File: src/services/task-dependency.service.ts
tasks.title: Implement buildGraph method

tasks.details:
Create test/unit/services/task-dependency.service.test.ts for graph building.

Test cases:
- Build graph from simple dependencies
- Handle tasks with no dependencies
- Build graph with blocks relationships
- Build graph with both depends-on and blocks
- Handle empty task list
- Graph structure is correct (adjacency list)

File: test/unit/services/task-dependency.service.test.ts
Target: src/services/task-dependency.service.ts
tasks.title: Unit tests for graph building

tasks.details:
Implement detectCircular() method using DFS algorithm.

detectCircular():
- Use depth-first search with visited/visiting states
- Detect back edges (cycles)
- Return cycle path if found
- Support both depends-on and blocks relationships
- Implement as described in ARCHITECTURE.md

Algorithm: Three-color DFS (white/gray/black nodes).

File: src/services/task-dependency.service.ts
tasks.title: Implement detectCircular method

tasks.details:
Create tests for circular dependency detection - basic cases.

Test cases:
- No circular dependencies (valid graph)
- Simple cycle: A -> B -> A
- Three-node cycle: A -> B -> C -> A
- Self-dependency: A -> A
- Multiple independent cycles

Extends existing test file: test/unit/services/task-dependency.service.test.ts
Target: src/services/task-dependency.service.ts
tasks.title: Unit tests for circular detection - basic

tasks.details:
Create tests for circular dependency detection - advanced edge cases.

Test cases:
- Cycle with long path: A -> B -> C -> D -> E -> C
- Cycle in one branch of complex graph
- Blocks relationship creates cycle
- Mixed depends-on and blocks create cycle
- No cycle but diamond dependency (A -> B,C -> D)

Extends existing test file: test/unit/services/task-dependency.service.test.ts
Target: src/services/task-dependency.service.ts
tasks.title: Unit tests for circular detection - advanced

tasks.details:
Add topological sort to TaskDependencyService.

- Returns tasks in dependency order (dependencies first)

tasks.details:
Create RoadmapRepository with caching layer.

Features:
- Cache loaded roadmaps in memory
- Invalidate cache on write
- LRU cache with configurable size
- Option to disable caching
- Watch file system for changes

This is a performance optimization for future consideration.

This is a future enhancement for configuration management.

tasks.details: Document plugin structure, oclif integration, MarkdownExporterService design, markdown format specification, and how the plugin leverages existing PRT services (RoadmapService, TaskQueryService, DisplayService)
tasks.title: Spec out examples/plugins/example-prt-plugin/ARCHITECTURE.md

tasks.details: Document how to install the plugin (prt plugins install/link), usage of the export command with examples, markdown output format, and configuration options. Target audience: plugin users and developers learning from the example
tasks.title: Build README.md for example-prt-plugin describing plugin use

tasks.details: Expand Section 8 (Extension Points) with detailed guidance on implementing oclif plugins for PRT: plugin structure, service imports, command patterns, testing strategies, and best practices. Reference example-prt-plugin as the canonical example
tasks.title: Update root ARCHITECTURE.md with plugin implementation guide

tasks.details: Create package.json with oclif configuration, peer dependencies (@oclif/core ^4, project-roadmap-tracking ^0.3.0), scripts (build, test, lint), and ES module settings. Set bin="prt" to extend PRT CLI.
tasks.title: Initialize plugin package.json

tasks.details: Create tsconfig.json with Node16 module resolution, ES2022 target, outDir=dist, and strict mode enabled. Match PRT's TypeScript configuration for compatibility.
tasks.title: Create TypeScript configuration

tasks.details: Create .eslintrc.json extending PRT's linting rules. Ensure consistency with main project code style.
tasks.title: Create ESLint configuration

tasks.details: Create src/, src/commands/, src/services/, test/, test/commands/, test/services/, and test/fixtures/ directories. Create placeholder index.ts files.
tasks.title: Create directory structure

tasks.details: Create src/index.ts that exports all commands for oclif discovery. Keep it minimal - oclif auto-discovers commands from the commands directory.
tasks.title: Create plugin entry point

tasks.details: Create src/services/markdown-exporter.service.ts with class structure, ExportOptions interface, and main export(roadmap, options) method signature. Import PRT types (Roadmap, Task, etc.) from dist/util/types.js.
tasks.title: Implement MarkdownExporterService base structure

tasks.details: Implement generateHeader() and generateMetadata() private methods. Header shows project name/description, metadata shows creation date, last updated, version info.
tasks.title: Implement header and metadata generation

tasks.details: Implement generateStatistics() using roadmapService.getStats(). Show task counts by status, type, and priority with visual formatting.
tasks.title: Implement statistics generation

tasks.details: Implement generateTaskSections() to group and sort tasks. Support grouping by status/type/priority (configurable via options). Use taskQueryService for filtering and sorting.
tasks.title: Implement task sections generation

tasks.details: Implement formatTask() to render individual task markdown with ID, title, type, status, tests, dates, details, notes, tags, and dependencies. Use dependency graph to show Depends On and Blocks sections.
tasks.title: Implement task formatting

tasks.details: Complete the main export() method to orchestrate all generation methods. Apply filtering options (--no-completed, --minimal) and assemble final markdown output.
tasks.title: Integrate all service methods

tasks.details: Create src/commands/export.ts extending oclif Command. Define all flags: --output/-o (file path), --no-completed (hide completed), --minimal (compact output), --group-by (status/type/priority), --sort-by, and filtering flags (--status, --priority, --type, --tags).
tasks.title: Implement export command structure

tasks.details: In export command's run() method, implement config loading via readConfigFile() and roadmap loading via roadmapService.load(). Add error handling for missing files.
tasks.title: Implement config and roadmap loading

tasks.details: Apply flag-based filtering using taskQueryService.filter(). Build ExportOptions object from parsed flags. Call MarkdownExporterService.export() with filtered roadmap and options.
tasks.title: Implement filtering and service integration

tasks.details: Implement file writing logic (if --output specified) or stdout output. Add success messages. Handle write errors gracefully.
tasks.title: Implement output handling

tasks.details: Create test/fixtures/ with sample roadmaps (empty roadmap, single task, complex roadmap with dependencies, roadmap with all task types). Include valid and edge cases.
tasks.title: Create test fixtures

tasks.details: Create test/services/markdown-exporter.service.test.ts. Test generateHeader() and generateMetadata() with various fixture roadmaps. Verify markdown format and content accuracy.
tasks.title: Unit tests for service - header and metadata

tasks.details: Test generateStatistics() with roadmaps containing different task distributions. Verify counts are accurate for status, type, and priority breakdowns.
tasks.title: Unit tests for service - statistics

tasks.details: Test formatTask() with tasks containing various combinations of details, notes, tags, dependencies. Verify markdown output format, dependency rendering, and edge cases (empty fields).
tasks.title: Unit tests for service - task formatting

tasks.details: Test complete export() method with all option combinations (--no-completed, --minimal, different grouping/sorting). Use golden file comparison for known-good outputs.
tasks.title: Unit tests for service - complete export

tasks.details: Create test/commands/export.test.ts. Test command execution with temp roadmap files, verify file output, test all flags, test error cases (missing config, invalid paths).
tasks.title: Integration tests for export command

tasks.details: Create examples/sample-export.md by running the export command against the main PRT roadmap (or a test roadmap). Demonstrates real-world plugin output.
tasks.title: Create sample export output

tasks.details: Run yarn build and verify TypeScript compilation succeeds. Run oclif manifest generation to create oclif.manifest.json. Verify command is discoverable.
tasks.title: Generate oclif manifest

tasks.details: Run full test suite (yarn test). Verify all tests pass. Check coverage report (aim for >95% coverage on service and command code).
tasks.title: Verify tests pass

tasks.details: Run yarn build && yarn lint to verify no type errors or linting issues. Test plugin installation with prt plugins link from plugin directory. Run prt export --help and prt export -o test-output.md against a real roadmap. Mark P-068 complete only after all checks pass.
tasks.title: Complete end-to-end verification

tasks.details:
Add logic to TaskService to update a task's type.

Updating the type should reassign the id as well to match (get new id to prevent collisions), and it should cascade to all other tasks' depends-on and blocks where the task was referenced.
The flag should be implemented in the update command to pass through as well.

File: src/services/task.service.ts
Target: src/commands/update.ts
tasks.title: Add update command flags for task type
